snippet: In “The Pushcart War,” “The Toothpaste Millionaire” and many other books, Ms. Merrill’s characters overcome the odds.
abstract: Jean Merrill, children’s author best known for her 1964 book The Pushcart War, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: In “The Pushcart War,” “The Toothpaste Millionaire” and many other books, Ms. Merrill’s characters overcome the odds.

headline.seo: Jean Merrill, Children’s Book Writer, Dies at 89
headline.main: Jean Merrill, a Writer of Children’s Underdog Tales, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Jean Merrill, 89, a Writer Of Children’s Underdog Tales
